short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the most from your credit cards every time you shop

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mote Money takes the guesswork out of managing your credit cards by helping you choose the best card to use with each purchase. We help you take your money further. 

Love saving money? We love it too! Our mission is to keep more money in your wallet.

We created Mote Money because credit cards are not that simple to manage and credit card companies do not have the incentive to work for you. 

We automatically recommend which of your credit cards will get the most for you with each purchase. 

You can choose your own goal, either the lowest interest fees, or max rewards and Mote Money will adjust its recommendations for your goal. 

Looking for better credit card options? Mote Money has your back and will also recommend new cards that may be a better fit for you. 


It all adds up to a suite of financial features that takes the guesswork out of buying and gives you confidence you are making great choices with your credit cards. 

Come experience Mote!
-------------------------------------------------------
 
By using this add-on, you agree to the Mote Money Privacy Policy  and Terms & Conditions available at www.motemoney.com
